title: struct Puv::v1_20_80::JigsawStructureProcessorList::Contents::Rule
description: A block rule that is evaluated on all blocks of a Structure Template. All predicates must evaluate to true in order for a block to be replaced by the output_state.

input_predicate.description: A predicate evaluated on the Structure Template block.

location_predicate.description: A predicate evaluated on the world block.

output_state.description: Block to replace the world block with if all predicates evaluate to true.

position_predicate.description: A predicate evaluated on the distance between the structure's world origin and the world block.

2064254608.title: struct Puv::v1_20_80::AlwaysTruePredicate
2064254608.description: Predicate that always evaluates to true. This is the default predicate if no other predicate is specified.

2398034529.title: struct Puv::v1_20_80::BlockMatchPredicate
2398034529.description: Predicate that evaluates to true with a given probability if the block at the specified location matches the specified block.

3447505495.title: struct Puv::v1_20_80::ArcheologyBlockLootPredicate
3447505495.description: Predicate that replaces a block and adds a loot table.

block_mapping.title: associative container
block_mapping.description: Mapping of block types to replace.

limit.description: Maximum number of blocks to replace within the structure.

loot_table.description: Loot table to assign to the replaced blocks.

3475560935.title: Block Specifier
3475560935.description: Specifies a particular block. Can be a string block name or a JSON object

states.title: associative container
states.description: Contains members named after each state, with boolean, integer, or string values.

4173529146.title: struct Puv::v1_20_80::BlockRulePredicate
4173529146.description: Predicate type used by input_predicate, location_predicate and distance_predicate.

always_true.description: Predicate that always evaluates to true. This is the default predicate if no other predicate is specified.

archeology_block_loot.description: Predicate that replaces a block and adds a loot table.

block_match.description: Predicate that evaluates to true with a given probability if the block at the specified location matches the specified block.

random_block_match.description: Predicate that evaluates to true with a given probability if the block at the specified location matches the specified block.

554534680.title: struct Puv::v1_20_80::RandomBlockMatchPredicate
554534680.description: Predicate that evaluates to true with a given probability if the block at the specified location matches the specified block.

probability.description: Probability of the evaluating to true when the block matches.
